mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, TITLE as title, CONTENTS as contents, WRITTEN_BY as writtenBy, UPDATE_BY as updateBy, WRITE_DATE as writeDate, UPDATE_DATE_TIME as updateDateTime, LOOKUP as lookup FROM BOARD WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY ID
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET LOOKUP = LOOKUP+1 WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT B.ID as id, B.TITLE as title, B.CONTENTS as contents, B.WRITTEN_BY as writtenBy, B.WRITE_DATE as writeDate, B.LOOKUP as lookup, f.FILE_ORINAME as fileOriName FROM BOARD B, Board_FILE f WHERE B.ID= #{id} ORDER BY B.ID ASC

SELECT B.ID as id, B.TITLE as title, B.CONTENTS as contents, B.WRITTEN_BY as writtenBy, B.WRITE_DATE as writeDate, B.LOOKUP as lookup, f.FILE_ORINAME as fileOriName, f.FILE_NAME as fileName FROM BOARD B, Board_FILE f WHERE B.ID= #{id} and B.ID = F.BOARD_ID ORDER BY B.ID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT RE.RID as rid , RE.RE_CONTENTS as reContents , RE.RE_WRITER AS reWritter ,RE.RE_WRITEDATE as reWrittedate FROM BOARD_REPLY RE LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD B ON RE.BID = B.ID WHERE RE.BID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_FILE (FILE_ID, BOARD_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORINAME, FILE_URL) VALUES ( BOARD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,BOARD_Seq.currval,#{fileName},#{fileOriName},#{fileUrl})
